dict.acceptation: 安全，平安；安全设备，保险装置；保险器，安全瓣；[棒]安全打；

sent.orig: Safety decision module includes safety information system, safety analysis system, and safety decision support expert system.
sent.trans: 行车安全决策模块包括行车安全信息系统、行车安全分析系统及安全决策支持专家系统。

sent.orig: Put on your safety helmet (safety harness, safety footwear, safety goggle ear defender), please.
sent.trans: 请戴上安全帽（安全带，安全靴，护目镜，护耳器）！

sent.orig: Adorn safety hamlet, safety belt and safety shoes correctly.
sent.trans: 1正确佩带安全帽、安全带、安全鞋。

sent.orig: Safety kernel is an important technology to assure safety of Safety critical software.
sent.trans: 安全核技术就是其中的重要措施之一。

sent.orig: Aim The basic concepts of safety, safety system, safety dynamics and others are discussed.
sent.trans: 目的探讨安全、安全系统、安全动力学等基本概念，充实发展安全科学。
